name: La Raza Centro Legal
description: Free legal services in immigration, housing, and workers' rights for Latino and immigrant communities
fullDescription: La Raza Centro Legal provides free legal services to Latino and immigrant communities in San Francisco, specializing in immigration, housing, and workers' rights.
whatTheyOffer:
- Immigration legal services (family petitions, DACA, asylum, citizenship)
- Tenant rights and eviction defense
- Workers' rights and wage claims
- Community education
- Bilingual services (English/Spanish)
howToGetIt:
1. Call 415-575-3500 for intake
2. Must meet income guidelines
3. Complete intake screening
4. Receive legal advice or representation
address: 474 Valencia Street, Suite 295, San Francisco, CA 94103
keywords: La Raza, San Francisco, immigration, tenant rights, housing, workers rights, Latino, Mission District, Spanish, free legal, DACA
